entries.title: The Papers: 'William's agony' and 'Mother's heartbreak' over Olivia

entries.title: Italy elections: 'It'll break my heart if energy costs shut my historic shop'
entries.description: Italian businesses fear politicians are failing to address the cost of living crisis ahead of elections.

entries.title: Queen Elizabeth II: King Charles III to visit Cardiff

entries.title: Roger Federer retires: Swiss legend a tennis great who reached sporting perfection

entries.title: Alice Capsey: Alex Hartley praises 18-year-old England batter
entries.description: Eighteen-year-old Alice Capsey is "the best talent I have seen for a long time in English cricket", says ex-England spinner Alex Hartley.

entries.title: Silkeborg IF 2-3 West Ham United: Hammers come from behind in Europa Conference League win
entries.description: West Ham United survive a late scare to come from behind to beat Danish side Silkeborg IF in the Europa Conference League.

entries.title: England v India: Sophia Dunkley and Alice Capsey shine as hosts secure 2-1 series victory in third Twenty20
entries.description: England beat India by seven wickets to win the third and final Twenty20 at Bristol and complete a 2-1 series victory.

entries.title: World's ‘oldest 3D heart’ found in prehistoric fish

entries.title: Emma Raducanu: British number one loses in Slovenia Open second round
entries.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu is out of the Slovenia Open after a disappointing defeat by Germany's Anna-Lena Friedsam in Portoroz.

entries.title: Wimbledon: Roger Federer's epic victory over Pete Sampras, 21 years on

entries.title: 'The Queen adopted my corgi's brother'

entries.title: The Queen and Paddington: How a bear became an unlikely royal mascot

entries.title: California drought: On patrol with the celebrity 'water police'
